text: 9.28 Ais 53.12, Lom 6.10, Tat 2.13, 1 Pi 2.24, 2 Pi 3.12, 1 Jo 3.5 Anɨb ak nep pen Klays binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal okok tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨm agɨl, mɨnek nokom yɨbɨl mubwak ne ke ak dɨl, God nop sɨbog ñak. Pen kɨdek tep adɨkɨd ownɨgab ñɨn ak, binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal okok tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨg ma ownɨgab. Binɨb nop tep gaknɨŋ kod mɨdebal okok, kɨlop pɨsnep tɨg asɨk dɨnɨg ownɨgab.
